title: Large-Scale Practice-Based Organizational Learning Simulation: Strengthening Mathematical Decision-Making Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational operations concepts and foundational mathematical modeling experience
context.additional_context: A program designed to provide practical experience in solving complex organizational problems within smartphone-based VR/simulation environments.

learning_goals: Learners can successfully derive daily problem-solving strategies for organizations three or more times using mathematical modeling in a simulated environment.
Learners can execute decision-making processes reflecting organizational sensitivities in VR-based scenarios with 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose two or more flexible strategies to respond to unpredictable organizational changes by applying a practice-based approach.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
